sources.title: Road To Happiness (1941) DRAMA
sources.description: Struggling singer Jeff Carter fulfills his career ambitions by taking a desperate step: he becomes a radio actor. His young son Danny and his press agent Charley Grady support him throughout this development.

sources.title: Road To Happiness
sources.description: A down-and-out singer turns to radio acting and finds his life turned around. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Road to Happiness (1941) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: John Boles, Mona Barrie, Billy Lee
Director: Phil Rosen

When a down-on-his luck singer turns to radio acting as a means of supporting his young son, he ultimately discovers the means of realizing his professional dreams!

metadata.Plot: Jeff Carter, a singer down on his luck, turns to radio acting as a means of supporting his young son Danny. With the support of his son and his press agent Charley Grady, Jeff ultimately finds radio the means of realizing his professional ambition.
metadata.Actors: John Boles, Mona Barrie, Billy Lee
